New Records: Darius Garland scored a season-high 40 points
Jarrett Allen had 18 points and 15 rebounds
Cleveland Cavaliers extended their win streak to 12
Cleveland Cavaliers are tied for the fifth-best record in league history
Cleveland Cavaliers have the top home mark in the NBA
Key Match Events: Jarrett Allen dove into the courtside seats to rebound Barnes’ missed turnaround
Garland followed with a 3-pointer that extended the Cavaliers’ lead to 129-124
Pre-Game Insights: Coach Kenny Atkinson called it a 'perfect trap game'
Raptors had a strong start but couldn't sustain it
Post-Match Reflections: Cleveland’s players didn’t take the message to heart until the final quarter
Coach Kenny Atkinson highlighted the victory as a crucial step toward the championship
Miscellaneous Highlights: Raptors are a league-worst 1-17 on the road
Cleveland also has the top home mark in the NBA
Donovan Mitchell was given the night off after playing a team-high 35 minutes Wednesday
